addon:addon.name: FTP Upload Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is for receiving files via FTP.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: TCP port of the FTP server

parameter.name: idleTimeout
parameter.label: Idle Timeout
parameter.description: The number of seconds before an inactive client is disconnected. If this value is set to 0, the idle time is disabled.

parameter.name: passivePorts
parameter.label: Passive Port Range
parameter.description: A string of passive ports, can contain a single port (as an integer), multiple ports seperated by commas (e.g. 123,124,125) or ranges of ports, including open ended ranges (e.g. 123-125, 30000-, -1023). Combinations for single ports and ranges is also supported. Empty (default) allows all ports as passive ports.
